name: Icebears Care
description:
This is a game about saving polar bears and babies. Keep the iceberg pieces from getting out of reach by stapling them back in place!

Controls:

  • Use the A / D keys to steer the boat Left / Right around the iceberg.
  • Use Space Bar to shoot staples at loose icebergs (no visual effect yet; only audio of staple sound).

There is currently no lose condition. The game ends after three minutes. You must Alt-F4 to quit the game.
